# registerObject(ofClass:visibility:loadHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Lazily adds representations of a specified object type to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency func registerObject<T>(ofClass: T.Type, visibility: NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility, loadHandler: @escaping ((T?, (any Error)?) -> Void) -> Progress?) where T : _ObjectiveCBridgeable, T._ObjectiveCType : NSItemProviderWriting
```

## Registering objects

- **registerObject(_:visibility:)**: Adds representations of a specified object to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.
- **registerObject(ofClass:visibility:loadHandler:)**: Lazily adds representations of a specified object class to an item provider, based on the object’s implementation of the item provider writing protocol, and adhering to a visibility specification.
- **register(_:)**: Adds representations of a specified transferable type to an item provider.
